actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to encourage the State to extend coverage under their State unemployment compensation laws to agricultural labor.

summary.text: Authorizes grants to States for deficits in State unemployment compensation accounts attributable to agricultural labor in an amount equal to 80 percent of the amount by which (1) the unemployment compensation paid under the State unemployment compensation law during the calendar year and attributable to agricultural labor, exceeded (2) 2.7 percent of the wages paid during such year for agricultural labor and subject to contributions under the State law. Specifies conditions for the payment of such grants.

titles.title: A bill to encourage the State to extend coverage under their State unemployment compensation laws to agricultural labor.
